cast.name: 巴斯卡拉·马亨德拉 Baskara Mahendra

introduction: Amanda is a transfer student, she lives in a dormitory so she can focus on taking part in the Biology Olympiad. There he met Adam and his gang, new friends who helped him from the torment of the bully student gang. Amanda's closeness to the Adam Gang sparked a cynical reaction from Davin who was an excellent student. Davin is still depressed over the departure of his best friend Kelly who committed suicide because of his viral erotic video, he suspects the Adam Gang as the spreader of the video. Slowly, Kelly's spirit comes to haunt them through video chat terror, asking for justice for the mystery of her death.
